DESCRIPTION: Creates a temporary file in a directory whose name starts with (at most) the first three characters of prefix.
EXAMPLE: <h3>GetTempFile Example</h3> <p>The temporary directory for this ColdFusion Server is <cfoutput>#GetTempDirectory()#</cfoutput>.</p> <p>We have created a temporary file called: <cfoutput>#GetTempFile(GetTempDirectory(),"testFile")#</cfoutput></p>

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: Prefix of a temporary file to create in the dir directory
